observations.note: Avg CTR = 0.0053 (dataset 25th pct = 0.0094) — flagged low CTR
Creative messages are static and feature-focused with no urgency or social proof

validated_hypotheses.statement: Creative fatigue — message is stale across placements
validated_hypotheses.evidence: negative ctr_slope; top creatives repeated the same phrase; frequency > 4
validated_hypotheses.effect: CTR down 35% vs prior month; p=0.0002; confidence=0.91

recommended_actions: Rotate creatives: introduce urgency + testimonial variants
A/B test new CTA vs control: 10% traffic, 7 days
Expand audience by +20% (lookalike threshold widening) to reduce frequency
